meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Libby Nelson Sergio Llorian Matt Douma Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6213.

td.p: Libby Nelson, a journalist from Kansas City, Missouri
Sergio Llorian, an attorney from New York, New York
Matt Douma, a standardized test scorer from Minneapolis, Minnesota (whose 2-day cash winnings total $54,100)

tr.td: INVENTORS & INVENTIONS
IF THEY MARRIED
TRIPLE THE FUN
BLANK VERSE
BEHIND BARS
2-LETTER RESPONSES

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
